Package cz2002

Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
cz2002.Invoice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
public class Invoice extends Object implements Printable
Represents an Invoice created for a table in the Restaurant Each table has one Invoice for a particular customer implements Print() method to print Invoice
Author:
wongl
